docs.title: PQC Lab
docs.text:
Welcome to my personal notebook for Post-Quantum Cryptography.

This site is a living, modular, experimental space where I document:

  • 🧩 Preliminaries - Background and foundations
  • 🏗️ PQC Fields - Families (lattice, code-based, hash-based, etc.)
  • 🔐 Algorithms - Concrete schemes (Kyber, Dilithium, SPHINCS+, etc.)
  • ⚙️ Implementation - Techniques, optimizations, side-channels
  • 🧪 Experiments - Empirical tinkering and intuition-building
  • 🛠️ Tools - Scripts, notebooks, utilities

Philosophy

This is not a textbook. It's modular, playful, and honestly messy. The goal is to build intuition, not perfection.

Last updated: January 2025
